text: phiraun ne kaha (hae) qabl isake ki mai tumhen ijaazat doon tum is par eemaan le aae beshak ye tumhaara bada (guru hai jisane tum sabako jaadoo sikhaaya hai to khair) abhee tum logon ko (isaka nateeja) maaloom ho jaega ki ham yaqeenan tumhaare ek taraph ke haath aur doosaree taraph ke paanv kaat daalegen aur tum sab ke sab ko soolee degen
